test.name: Verify the Top Navigation Links

kw.name: Begin Chrome Web Test
kw.doc: Test Setup opens a browser

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given Common.Go To BBC News Page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Then BBCNewsActionsMenu.Cosent To Share Your Personal Data
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="page"]//h2[@class="module__title"]/span' contains exact text 'Welcome to BBC.com'.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Convert Date
kw.doc: Converts between supported `date formats`.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Log List
kw.doc: Logs the length and contents of the ``list`` using given ``level``.
kw.msg: List length is 20 and it contains following items: 0: Vivendi buys US education publisher 1: French media and utility giant Vivendi snaps up US independent education publisher Houghton Mifflin in $1.7bn deal. 2: Naomi Wolf: US publisher cancels book release after accuracy concerns 3: A BBC radio interview revealed the author had misunderstood British legal terms about homosexuality. 4: Dick sci-fi journals to come out 5: Exegesis, the journals of science fiction author Philip K Dick, will be published next year. 6: Epic photographic odyssey that documented Native Americans 7: At the dawn of the 20th century, photographer Edward Curtis captured the dwindling Native American population in stunning photographs. 8: Egypt uprising figure Wael Ghonim signs book deal 9: Wael Ghonim, the Google executive seen as a key figure in the protests in Egypt that ousted President Hosni Mubarak, signs a book deal. 10: US publisher delays Naomi Wolf's book over accuracy concerns 11: It comes after it emerged in a BBC radio interview that she had misunderstood British legal terms. 12: Media giants back Wind parody 13: Microsoft and a group of US media companies back the publication of a parody of the classic novel Gone With the Wind. 14: Amazon Matchbook offer bundles print and ebooks 15: Amazon is to offer US shoppers the ability to obtain digital copies of previously purchased printed books for free or at a discount. 16: Wind parody wins appeal 17: A US federal appeals court affirms a May ruling that a controversial parody of Gone With The Wind is entirely legal. 18: Markets applaud Vivendi divorce 19: The French media firm's decision to split from its lucrative but incongruous water subsidiary is greeted with approval by investors.

kw.name: End Web Test
